title: What is the net worth of the top 5 rich people in the world in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1. Jeff Bezos CEO of Amazon 2010 net worth: $12.3 billion 2019 net worth: $111.5 billion How much richer: $99.2 billion 2. Bernard Arnault (and family) Chairman and chief executive of French company LVMH, the world’s largest luxury goods conglomerate 2010 net worth: $27.5 billion 2019 net worth: $109.9 billion 3. Bill Gates Co-founder of Microsoft 2010 net worth: $53 billion 2019 net worth: $108.2 billion 4. Warren Buffett Chairman and CEO of Berkshire Hathaway 2010 net worth: $47 billion 2019 net worth: $88.8 billion 5. Amancio Ortega Co-founder of Spanish fashion company Inditex, which owns Zara 2010 net worth: $25 billion 2019 net worth: $77.1 billion
